items.text: slower ball at the pads, tapped to short fine's right
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: length ball at off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: inside half as he's done by the offcutter, but he gets it past mid-on. Length ball on off and he's gone through the cover drive quickly
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, FOUR runs

items.text: short ball into the stumps, stands tall and pulls to deep square
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: slower ball at a length outside off, cut into the covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: slider, short of a length outside off. Inside edge onto pad as he gets on the back foot to punch
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: full ball down leg side, can't get bat on the sweep
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 wide

items.text: floated up outside off, mistimed drive to mid-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: short of a length slider down leg, can't get bat on the pull
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 wide

items.text: full on off stump, punched firmly back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: length ball on leg stump, nudged to deep midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: out of the ground. This length ball has landed in Gayle's arch and he's golf-swung the hell out of it! Straight over the roof behind the bowler's hand. Doesn't look like he's put in even the slightest effort in losing this ball.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, SIX runs

items.text: outside edge past slip. This one dips on Gayle and he isn't to the pitch as he swings across the line. Holds its line outside off but it's too quick for slip
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on off stump, blocked down the pitch
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: inside edge trickles to short fine's left. Looks to pull a short ball from the stumps that hasn't quite risen
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, punched to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: slower ball on off stump, pings off the outside edge into the covers as he looks to defend
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: length on the stumps and he drags this straight to midwicket with an angled bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: full outside off, short stride as he looks to drive. It's aerial but it lands short of extra cover
items.postText: MJ ahshan: "Bangladesh need to get rid of Gayle ASAP if they want to win the match/series, But the universe boss seems to be in the mood for a big one today. "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: length outside off, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: misfield. That is terrible work at square leg. It's a full ball on leg and Gayle has no control as he looks to drive and gets an inside edge. It's to the fielder's left there and he just has two strides to cover. Gets there but lets it through
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: length outside off, gets forward and is beaten as it spins past his forward defence
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: a review for lbw. Gayle shuffles slightly and looks to flick. He's struck on the pad. Remember, Mehidy is bowling around the wicket. This ball hasn't straightened - it goes with the arm. Leg stump visible as he misses this. No bat involved...and it's going down. They'll lose their review.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, punched to the bowler off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run
